title: Destiny
overview: The story follows Song Ruan, an ordinary, kind-hearted, and energetic girl who, facing difficulties in her career, unexpectedly crosses paths with Chu Xingyan, a top celebrity idol also feeling lost in pursuit of his dreams. Despite their vast differences in background, personality, and social status, the two embark on a journey of mutual pursuit and growth, unfolding a beautiful and romantic love story set in the modern city.
